name: iVideo Converter v5.1
short_description:
iVideoConverter is a simple and easy-to-use YouTube downloader, MP3 converter and ringtone maker. Users can download videos and convert to MP3 hassle free. iVideoConverter converts video to multiple audio or video formats and provides easy play back on computers, cell phones or mobile devices. iVideoConverter also allows users to turn any video into a MP3 ringtone, without sound quality loss.

iVideoConverter is more than a video downloader, it allows users to download HD videos and convert them to any common video format. The program is easy to use. Just specify the URL for the video desired and click the Download button. From there, iVideoConverter will download the video from specified URL, then automatically convert the video into the desired audio or video format. 

iVideoConverter has an easy to use tabbed interface for simple downloading, converting, and playing. It also allows users to convert downloaded videos for iPad, iPod, iPhone, Cell Phone, Windows Media, and XVid.
